Text: Replacing the AU isn't working. Can anyone confirm this has worked for them?

This worked perfect for me.

1. Install.
2. Go to "Macintosh HDD/Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/Components" and replace all of the components with the included component files.
3. Use in whatever software program you have (such as Ableton)

Note: For Ableton, you need to turn on Audio Units in the preferences menu before you can use these.

Thanks DADA, this is great!
